short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to report spoilers and other rule violations in the NearlyOnRed Twitch chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to report spoilers and other rule violations in the NearlyOnRed Twitch chat with only two clicks.
There's not much else to explain.
